General.Name: Crealogix Holding AG
General.Description: Crealogix Holding AG, a fintech company, provides banking software solutions in Switzerland, rest of Europe, and internationally. The company offers CREALOGIX Digital Hub, a digital engagement platform that enables to accelerate the digitalization of products and services; CREALOGIX Conversational AI, which delivers next-generation customer interaction for financial institutions; and CREALOGIX Funding Portal, an integrated digital funding portal that enables to digitalize the funding process from application to payout. It offers solutions for wealth management, retail banking, corporate banking, and SME banking. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.
